phrases.phraseTranslated: You are so people, so tell me
Don't see that we aren't the same

phrases.phrase: I got one less problem without you!
phrases.phraseTranslated: Tengo un problema menos sin ti

phrases.phrase: Head in the clouds got no weight on my shoulders
phrases.phraseTranslated: Cabeza en las nubes no tiene peso en mis hombros

phrases.phrase: Every time you touch me and say you love me
phrases.phraseTranslated: Cada vez que me tocas y dices que me amas
You are so people, so tell me
Don't see that we aren't the same
